metadata.title: CVE-2021-39361 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In GNOME evolution-rss through 0.3.96, network-soup.c does not enable TLS certificate verification on the SoupSessionSync objects it creates, leaving users vulnerable to network MITM attacks. NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2016-20011.

criterions.comment: evolution-rss package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
